vector-skin-desc:
Bɔɔmi 2 Vector niŋgbana:
 
* 2011- nannana MonoBook buudir nɛ li nindapaalim nɛ amɛŋ tʋʋma bɛdegʋ tuon ken.
*2022- vector la nɔbigi paasWMF[[mw:Desktop Improvements]] tʋʋma
prefs-vector-enable-vector-1-label: Nɔkim laʋk kanɛ nar la tʋm
prefs-vector-enable-vector-1-help:
Yʋma banɛ kenna la, ti na tisid gbaʋŋ laʋk labaar bi'el-bi'el. Sida suor laʋk la na kɛ ka fʋ gɔs laʋk kʋdʋg la zi'esim (nwɛnnɛ samanpiid nwadig 2019). Azamis yɛla bɛdegʋ Kat wa'ae nɛ labapaala nii,kemi ti mw
[[mw:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
vector-opt-out-tooltip: Tiakimi fʋ zi'esim la n lɛb nya'aŋ keŋ gbaʋŋ kʋdir la nindaagin
vector-language-button-aria-label: Kem labaar kanɛ sɔb bɛ buudi piank ayinne ni. Bɛnɛɛ {{PLURAL:$1$1 language|$1 languages}}
vector-no-language-button-aria-label: Sɔb labaar kaŋa bɛnɛ pian'ʋk kaŋa ni ma'a.paasim sɔb labaar la bɛ buudi pian'ʋk kɔn'ɔb kɔn'ɔbin
vector-language-redirect-to-top: Buudi pian'ʋk liŋnam bɛnɛ gɔl lakir linɛ puue yi pian'azugin la
vector-anon-user-menu-pages-label: Zamisim bɛdegʋ Kat wa'ae nɛ a-maal sɔbʋg yɛla
vector-limited-width-toggle-on-popup: Fʋ din fʋ maalʋg la n yɔ'ɔgi li yalʋŋ wʋsa. Fʋ ya'a ye fʋ lɛb nya'aŋ,diinm bɔtɔn kaŋa
vector-limited-width-toggle-off-popup: Fʋ tʋn'e nyaŋi din yɔ'ɔg yalʋŋ bil nɛ yalʋŋ wʋsa tensʋk dɔllisidi adin diinsid kaŋa.
vector-prefs-limited-width-help: Sʋŋim yalʋŋ giŋ suodɔllisim ka li nɔbig karʋŋ baŋir
empty-language-selector-body: Lakir yɛlkpana pʋ siak sʋŋ bɛ buudi pian'ad sieba nam nii
vector-toc-unpinned-popup: Teebul la yɛlkpana vudigi kpɛn' kpɛla na
vector-page-tools-unpinned-popup: La'ad dɔɔg la vudigi kpɛn' kpɛla na
vector-main-menu-unpinned-popup: La'ad Dɔmɛŋir la vudigi kpɛn' kpɛla na
vector-readability-survey-description: Wikipedia sɔbʋg la an sʋ'ʋŋa wala-wala tisif? Nɔkim silaida nam banɛ digi gbinnin la maal nwɛnnɛm la. Zamisim bɛdegʋ Kat wa'ae nɛ [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Reading/Web/Accessibility for reading|Ya'ag suor tis tʋʋma karʋŋ]].
vector-readability-survey-optout: Diinmi a-tɔlis-tuon n zaŋi fʋ dɔllisʋg maalʋg la tisi ti ka nɔki ban lɛbisif labasi'a la pa'al sɔ' wʋsa bɛ sɔbʋg lakirin la.[[#close-vector-survey|Yiisim laʋk kaŋa bas]].
